Positioning Foreground Image

Select positions to place foreground images.

Class Args:

  • path_dir : path to directory
  • file_csv : annotation file name
  • file_image : image name
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class PreviewFore[source]

PreviewFore(path_dir:Path, file_csv:str, file_image:str) :: UtilsBuildLinearCoord

PreviewFore(path_dir:pathlib.Path, file_csv:str, file_image:str)

{% endraw %}

Build Composite Image

Build composite image.

Class Args:

  • image_id : synthetic image id
  • fname_train : file name of synthetic image
  • path_train : path to directory in which to strore synthetic images
  • original_background : path to directory where petri(background) images are stored
  • path_annotation_file: path to file where annotation file is stored
  • fore_zone : path where zone(foreground) images are stored
  • fore_disk : path where disk(foreground) images are stored
  • is_crowd : default=0
  • category_zone : default=0
  • category_disk : default=1
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

SyntheticImageBuild(image_id:int, fname_train:str, path_train:pathlib.Path, original_background:pathlib.Path, path_annotation_file:pathlib.Path, fore_zone:pathlib.Path, fore_disk:pathlib.Path, is_crowd:int=0, category_zone:int=0, category_disk:int=1)
